mapper.select: select USER.USERNO, USER.ID, USER.PASSWORD, USER.NAME, ROLE.ROLENAME from USER join USERROLE on USER.USERNO = USERROLE.USERNO join ROLE on ROLE.ROLENO = USERROLE.ROLENO where USER.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into USER (ID, PASSWORD, NAME) values (#{id},#{password},#{name});
mapper.select: select USERNO from USER where ID = #{ID}
select ROLENO from ROLE where ROLENAME = #{roleName}
